item.title: Setting up the new blog
item.description: Previous setup Previously I was writing a blog using the following: Emacs + Org-Mode + Jekyll. Here is a short assessment of that setup: The pros: Emacs tries to pack as much functionality as possible without the need for external dependencies Org-Mode allows you to have runnable code blocks and include the results of said code blocks inside the rendered version of the documents.
